participant_1.background:
I read twenty books a year.
I am a stunt double as my second job.
I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.
I was raised in a single parent household.
I only eat kosher.

participant_2.background:
I am a woman.
I am married.
I am a vegetarian.
I enjoy sports such as running.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to run, I'm a vegetarian, and I'm married.
Oh, that's cool! I love reading, I'm a stunt double, and I was raised in a single parent household.
Wow, you're a stunt double? That's so cool! I've always wanted to do that.
It's actually a lot of fun! I get to do all sorts of cool things, like fall off of buildings and drive cars really fast.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure it's a lot of work, though.
It is, but it's worth it. I love the adrenaline rush.
I can imagine! So, what do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of things, but I mostly read thrillers and mysteries. I like books that keep me on the edge of my seat.
Me too! I love a good mystery. I just finished reading "The Girl on the Train" and it was amazing.
I've heard great things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should. It's a really good book. So, what's your favorite book?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorite books, but I think my favorite one is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
I love that book! It's so beautiful and tragic.
It is. It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and still find something new every time.
I agree. It's a classic for a reason.
So, what's your favorite thing about being married?
My favorite thing about being married is having someone to share my life with. My husband is my best friend and I love spending time with him.
That's so sweet. I'm happy for you.
Thanks. I am too.
